lines.text: No!
No!
No, I tell you, I havea de seal of de Pope!
Oh! He hasa de seal of de Pope!
NO! Help me!
Help me!
Someone help me!
Someone help me!
No! No, I tell you! No, Help me! Help me someone!
The Pope also want the Inquisition to stop the use of torture. And declare an amnesty on all heretics and witches. Hmm?
Rome is behind the times. His Holiness is old and lost his zeal!
He is the Pope!
And I am the Inquisition!
His Holiness also DEMAND...order you to return to Rome with me for an audience.
I've received no such demand.

[chuckles]
I just deliver it!

[about to be killed]
No!
Yes!
I'm sorry, mistress, that you weren't properly able to confess. There just wasn't enough time to torture you.
Thanks anyway.
Surely Rome understands that public executions discourage sin?
The good Lord, you know, padre, he want us to love our neighbor, no roast him, mmm? No roast him ...
You idiots, why did you tear out her tongue?
We didn't. We don't do tongues.
Of course not. How can they confess if they don't have tongues?
[As Torquemada has the Cardinal bricked behind a wall]
For the love of God!
Yes, for the love of God.
Take them to their cells.
You swore you'd show mercy!
In this place, death is mercy.
Savior.
What are you doing here? Why don't you go torture some heretics!
I swear by all the saints I'm not a witch.
